alert.note: Alert for Clackamas; Marion (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 27 at 6:18AM PST until January 31 at 10:03AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oregon... Pudding River at Aurora affecting Clackamas and Marion Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pudding River at Aurora. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...Above 24.0 feet, expect considerable flooding of low-lying agricultural land and secondary roads from the Whiskey Hill area downstream to the confluence with the Molalla River. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:00 AM PST Saturday the stage was 21.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 21.0 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage is expected to be reached around 4 am Sunday, cresting around 23.5 feet around 9 am Monday. The river is expected to remain above flood stage through Tuesday night. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening at 630 PM PST.
